content: double_crochet increase 11 slip_stitch row 5 double_crochet 3 double_crochet increase around 60 sts join with a slip_stitch into the first stitch stsc double_crochet 2 double_crochet increase double_crochet 3 double_crochet stsc stsc double_crochet 2 double_crochet increase increase 11 finish o� with an invisible join or a slip_stitch insert the needle in the cut the yarn pull through second stitch insert the needle in the middle of the last stitch if desired embroider the cat face using color b let your creativity shine or feel free to replicate the designs from the picture below weave in the ends congratulations you ve completed your cattitude coaster if you share your finished coasters on social media please tag me i d love to see your 🙂 creations instagram @kami_crochet_x tiktok @kami crochet usage rights for personal use only feel free to sell finished products but please credit the designer kami tomczak kami crochet
